response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align perfectly with your needs. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. If you decide to proceed with this opportunity, you can acquire the product for $9,500. This special price is valid for a limited time only, so please let me know if you are interested in securing this deal. I look forward to the possibility of working with you and delivering exceptional value through our product.", "product_price": 9500}
